## Some stuff about me

 * Project manager that leads cross-functional and cross-disciplinary collaborations
 
 * Certified Ecologist with expertise in research, project management, and data analysis of spatial and tabular data.
 
 * Adept at statistics analysis using R programming, Python, Tableau, Arc Geographic Information Systems
